### Bio 
I am a first-year PhD student in the [School of Statistics](https://cla.umn.edu/statistics) at the University of Minnesota, and a trainee in the [Data Science in Multi-Messenger Astrophysics (DSMMA) program](https://dsmma.umn.edu/). 

Before moving to Minnesota, I received my MS in Statistics from the [Statistics Department](https://stat.oregonstate.edu/) at Oregon State University where I was advised by Professor [Sarah Emerson](https://stat.oregonstate.edu/content/emerson-sarah), and my BS in Mathematics from [Western Washington University](https://mathematics.wwu.edu/) where I worked with Professor [Kimihiro Noguchi](https://mathematics.wwu.edu/people/noguchk). 

### Contact Information

### Research Interests

  * Multiple hypothesis testing
  * Selective inference 
  * Resampling methods
  * Large-scale and high-dimensional inference
  * Uncertainty quantification for machine learning procedures
